basic.description:
{Basic Pathfinding}

Reduces the movement penalty for rough terrain by 25%.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Pathfinding}

Reduces the movement penalty for rough terrain by 50%, and increases land movement by 5%.

expert.description:
{Expert Pathfinding}

Reduces the movement penalty for rough terrain by 75%, and increases land movement by 10%.

basic.description:
{Basic Archery}

Increases the damage done by range attacking creatures by 20%, and improves ammo cart durability.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Archery}

Increases the damage done by range attacking creatures by 40%, and improves ammo cart durability.

expert.description:
{Expert Archery}

Increases the damage done by range attacking creatures by 60%, and improves ammo cart durability.

basic.description:
{Basic Scouting}

Allows your hero to see 1 square further into the shroud, and increases land movement by 5%.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Scouting}

Allows your hero to see 2 squares further into the shroud, and increases land movement by 10%.

expert.description:
{Expert Scouting}

Allows your hero to see 3 squares further into the shroud, and increases land movement by 15%.

basic.description:
{Basic Navigation}

Increases your hero's movement points at sea by 25%, and allows them to board ships without losing all movement.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Navigation}

Increases your hero's movement points at sea by 75%.

expert.description:
{Expert Navigation}

Increases your hero's movement points at sea by 150%.

basic.description:
{Basic Leadership}

Increases morale and attack by 1.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Leadership}

Increases morale and attack by 2.

expert.description:
{Expert Leadership}

Increases morale and attack by 3.

basic.description:
{Basic Mysticism}

Allows your hero to regenerate an additional 3 spell point per day, and increases maximum spell points by 20%.

advanced.description:
{Advances Mysticism}

Allows your hero to regenerate an additional 6 spell points per day, and increases maximum spell points by 40%.

expert.description:
{Expert Mysticism}

Allows your hero to regenerate an additional 9 spell points per day, and increases maximum spell points by 60%.

basic.description:
{Basic Luck}

Increases luck and defense by 1.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Luck}

Increases luck and defense by 2.

expert.description:
{Expert Luck}

Increases luck and defense by 3.

basic.description:
{Basic Ballistics}

Allows aimed shots with increased damage, eliminates wall penalties and reduces damage taken from ranged attacks by 10%.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Ballistics}

Allows two aimed shots with increased damage, eliminates wall penalties and reduces damage taken from ranged attacks by 20%.

expert.description:
{Expert Ballistics}

Allows two aimed shots with maximum damage, eliminates wall penalties and reduces damage taken from ranged attacks by 30%.

basic.description:
{Basic Eagle Eye}

Allows your hero to see 1 square further into the shroud, and increases ranged damage by 10%.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Eagle Eye}

Allows your hero to see 2 squares further into the shroud, and increases ranged damage by 20%.

expert.description:
{Expert Eagle Eye}

Allows your hero to see 2 squares further into the shroud, and increases ranged damage by 40%.

basic.description:
{Basic Scholar}

Increases all XP gained by 25%, and knowledge by 1.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Scholar}

Increases all XP gained by 50%, and knowledge by 2.

expert.description:
{Expert Scholar}

Increases all XP gained by 75%, and knowledge by 3.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Tactics}

Allows you to rearrange troups within 5 hex rows, and increases their speed by 1.

expert.description:
{Expert Tactics}

Allows you to rearrange troups within 7 hex rows, and increases their speed by 2.

basic.description:
{Basic Artillery}

Gives control of the ballista to the hero, a 50% chance to inflict double damage and improves ballista durability.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Artillery}

Allows two shot with a 75% chance to inflict double damage, and improves ballista durability.

expert.description:
{Expert Artillery}

Allows three shot with a 100% chance to inflict double damage, and improves ballista durability.

basic.description:
{Basic Learning}

Increases a hero's earned experience by 50%.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Learning}

Increases a hero's earned experience by 100%.

expert.description:
{Expert Learning}

Increases a hero's earned experience by 150%.

basic.description:
{Basic Armorer}

Hero's troops take 5% less physical damage. Applied twice against melee attacks.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Armorer}

Hero's troops take 10% less physical damage. Applied twice against melee attacks.

expert.description:
{Expert Armorer}

Hero's troops take 15% less physical damage. Applied twice against melee attacks.

basic.description:
{Basic Sorcery}

Increases all spell damage by 10%, and power by 1.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Sorcery}

Increases all spell damage by 20%, and power by 2.

expert.description:
{Expert Sorcery}

Increases all spell damage by 30%, and power by 3.

basic.description:
{Basic Resistance}

Endows a hero's troops with 5% resistance against magic and all damage.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Resistance}

Endows a hero's troops with 10% resistance against magic and all damage.

expert.description:
{Expert Resistance}

Endows a hero's troops with 15% resistance against magic and all damage.

basic.description:
{Basic First Aid}

Grants manual control of the first aid tent, increases healing to 50 points, and increases tent durability.

advanced.description:
{Advanced First Aid}

First aid tent heals 75 points, and troops have 10% more health.

expert.description:
{Expert First Aid}

First aid tent heals 100 points, and troops have 20% more health.
